about.description: Lapor Parkir is a community-driven app that helps citizens report parking violations and contribute to better urban mobility. Together, we can create more organized and accessible public spaces.
about.reportViolationsDesc: Easily report parking violations with location and violation type details.
about.searchReportsDesc: Find and filter violation reports by location, date, and violation type.
about.plateTypesDesc: Identify and categorize different vehicle plate types including police, diplomatic, and more.
about.developerInfo: This app was developed as part of a community initiative to improve urban mobility and parking compliance.
about.disclaimer: This app is for community use only. Please verify all reports with local authorities before taking any action.
about.madeWith: Made with ❤️ for better cities by Michael Jong

report.plateTypeSubtitle: Select the type of license plate
report.violationTypeError: Please select at least one violation type
report.notesPlaceholder: Add any additional details about the violation...
report.submitError: Failed to save report. Please try again.
report.validationError: Please fill in all required fields
report.title: Report New Violation

search.noReportsSubtitle: Start by reporting a parking violation in the Report tab
search.noMatchingReportsSubtitle: Try adjusting your search terms or filters
search.deleteConfirmMessage: Are you sure you want to delete this report? This action cannot be undone.
search.deleteError: Failed to delete report. Please try again.

locationPicker.permissionNeeded: Location access is needed to get your current location.
locationPicker.getCurrentLocationError: Could not get current location. Please enter the address manually.
locationPicker.gpsNote: This will use your device's GPS to automatically detect your current location.
locationPicker.addressPlaceholder: Enter the address where the violation occurred...
locationPicker.webInfo: On web, manual address entry is recommended for better accuracy.
locationPicker.genericInfo: You can either use your current GPS location or manually enter the address where the parking violation occurred.
